A discourse concerning the idolatry practised in the Church of Rome and the danger of salvation in the communion of it in an answer to some papers of a revolted Protestant : wherein a particular account is given of the fanaticism and divisions of that church / by Edward Stilingfleet. Stillingfleet, Edward, 1635-1699.
[37], 573 p.
Printed by Robert White for Henry Mortlock, London : 1671.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
